name: Aesan Protector
effect: Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.) On Enter: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand.
effect_raw:
Intercept (Whenever your champion is attacked while this ally is awake, you may redirect that attack to this ally.)
On Enter: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand.

rule.description: Aesan Protector must return a target ally you control with his On Enter effect. This means if he is the only ally you control, he will be the target of his own effect and return to his owner's hand.

result_editions.effect: Intercept On Enter: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand.
result_editions.flavor: True strength lies with the company you keep.

editions.effect: Intercept On Enter: Return target ally you control to its owner's hand.
editions.flavor: True strength lies with the company you keep.

name: Carter, Synthetic Reaper
effect: Class BonusCleave Whenever an ally dies, recover 1. On Enter: You may sacrifice another ally. If you do, Carter gets +2 until end of turn. If an Automaton ally was sacrificed this way, draw a card.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] Cleave
Whenever an ally dies, recover 1.
On Enter: You may sacrifice another ally you control. If you do, Carter gets +2 power until end of turn. If an Automaton ally was sacrificed this way, draw a card.

rule.title: ERRATA
rule.description: 'sacrifice another ally you control. -> sacrifice another ally.'

name: Combo Strike
effect: Class BonusLevel 2+On Kill: Wake up your champion. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class, and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
effect_raw: [Class Bonus] [Level 2+] On Kill: Wake up your champion. (Apply this effect only if your champion's class matches this card's class, and only if your champion is level 2 or higher.)
flavor: On currents of wind born from the exchanging of blows, warriors dance and blades glide.

result_editions.effect: Class Bonus Level 2+On Kill: Wake up your champion.

name: Cometfall
effect: Starcalling — 2 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.) Deal 3 damage to all non-astra element units. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to those units instead.
effect_raw:
Starcalling — 2 (As you're looking at this card while glimpsing, you may activate it by paying this cost. If you do, put all other cards you're looking at on the bottom of your deck in any order.)
Deal 3 damage to all non-astra element units. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to those units instead.

rule.description: If you starcall a card, that card is put onto the stack during the glimpse effect. It does not start resolving until after the current effect finishes resolving. For example, Scry the Skies has you glimpse 4, you starcall a card, you finish resolving Scry the Skies by drawing a card into your memory, then the effects stack can start resolving more cards.

result_editions.effect: Starcalling — 2 Deal 3 damage to all non-astra element units. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to those units instead.
result_editions.flavor: “May the skies divine your fate.”

editions.effect: Starcalling — 2 Deal 3 damage to all non-astra element units. Class Bonus: Deal 4 damage to those units instead.

name: Corhazi Arsonist
effect: Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Corhazi Arsonist gains stealth until end of turn. If a unit hit by Corhazi Arsonist this turn would die, banish it instead.
effect_raw:
Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Corhazi Arsonist gains stealth until end of turn.
If a unit hit by Corhazi Arsonist this turn would die, banish it instead.

rule.description: If a unit hit by Corhazi Arsonist dies on the same turn, that unit is banished. This means that On Death effects won't trigger.

result_editions.flavor: There can be no evidence if all that is left is ash.

editions.flavor: There can be no evidence if all that is left is ash.

On Enter: Put a preparation counter on your champion.
REST, Remove a preparation counter from your champion: Target unit's attacks get -3 power until end of turn.

effect: Glimpse 3. (To glimpse, look at that many cards from the top of your deck. Put those cards back on the top or on the bottom of your deck in any order.) Reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is wind element, put it into your hand.

name: Freydis, Master Tactician
effect: Class BonusAt the beginning of your recollection phase, put a tactic counter on Freydis, then glimpse X where X is the amount of tactic counters on Freydis. Remove three tactic counters from Freydis: For the rest of the game, Ranger units you control are always distant.
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] At the beginning of your recollection phase, put a tactic counter on Freydis, then glimpse X where X is the amount of tactic counters on Freydis. 
Remove three tactic counters from Freydis: For the rest of the game, Ranger units you control are always distant.

rule.description: Freydis' activated ability affects all Ranger units you control, even those that enter the field under your control after this effect resolves.

Brew — Three Herbs (You may sacrifice the listed objects rather than pay this card's reserve cost.) 
Sacrifice Serum of Wisdom: Glimpse 3. Draw a card into your memory.

rule.description: When paying the Brew cost, modifications to the card's reserve cost is ignored. Other additional costs such as 'as an additional cost to activate this card, sacrifice an ally', is not ignored.

name: Song of Frost
effect: Class BonusYou may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost. If a unit is attacking, end the combat phase. (As a phase ends, banish all triggers, activations, and materializations on the effects stack.)
effect_raw:
[Class Bonus] You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost.
If a unit is attacking, end the combat phase. (As a phase ends, banish all triggers, activations, and materializations on the effects stack.)

rule.description: When the combat phase ends abruptly due to Song of Frost, the combat phase clean up still happens. During this time, cards in intents are moved to the graveyard (they are not banished like activations on the stack).

result_editions.effect: Class Bonus You may banish a card with floating memory from your graveyard rather than pay this card's reserve cost. If a unit is attacking, end the combat phase.

name: Spirit of Fire
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Smoldering flames burn bright from within the soul, sparking a hunger for insight and destruction.

editions.flavor: The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The leyline within Flagma flares to life once more, bathing intrepid souls in a fiery vortex of might.
The vermillion bird blazes a fiery trail across the horizon, alight with a passion for knowledge.

name: Spirit of Water
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Convalescing waves cascade through the soul, revitalizing the body and mind from the depths.

editions.flavor: The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The leyline buried in Krustal shatters awake again, infusing dauntless souls with freezing clarity.
The tides and waves thrash again as serpent and tortoise entwined awaken from their slumber.

name: Spirit of Wind
effect: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
effect_raw: On Enter: Draw seven cards.
flavor: Turbulent zephyrs swirl around the soul, inspiring fleet-footed dreams and expedited efficiency.

editions.flavor: The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
The leyline encircling Winbless surges forward, invigorating curious souls with a spark of ingenuity.
Auspicious fortune and good tidings follow the silver tiger on its fleet-footed journey through seasons.
